description: 2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle game developed by Gabriele Cirulli. Merge tiles with the same power of 2 to get the total sum. The goal is to keep merging tiles this way until you reach 2048!

howToPlay: Use arrow keys to move all number tiles
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one
The goal is to create a tile with the number 2048
The game ends when the board fills up and no more moves are possible
tips: Keep the largest number in a corner
Build number sequences along the edges

title: Count Masters: Stickman Games
description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

howToPlay: Fast-paced 3D runner with epic crowd battles
Fun strategy and math choices with every gate
Boss fights and challenging traps
Colorful, satisfying visuals and smooth controls

controls.mouse: Mouse = Move the character by moving the mouse left or right. Left-click to select buttons.
controls.keyboard: Keyboard = Use the left and right arrow keys to move. Press space to select actions.

tips: Don't just rush forward—choose gates that give you the best numbers, even if they're not directly in your path.
Avoid red gates and dangerous traps that shrink your army.
Upgrade your starting crowd and gate bonuses early to grow faster in each run.
Watch enemy movements and time your attacks—charging in blindly can cost your entire team.
Save coins between runs to boost your strength and make harder levels easier.

title: Five-O
description: Five-O puts a numerical twist on the classic crossword board game! Instead of letters, you place number tiles, forming sequences that must add up to multiples of five, with no more than five tiles per sequence. Think strategically, maximize your bonuses, and outscore your opponent in Five-O!

howToPlay: Click to start the game
Follow the on-screen instructions
Use mouse or touch controls to interact
Complete objectives to progress

controls.mouse: Drag the left mouse button to place the numbered tile.

tips: Take turns placing intersecting number sequences that sum to a multiple of five.
The first sequence must start on the center square, and each new sequence must connect to existing tiles.
Earn points based on the sum of your sequence, plus bonuses from special board squares.
Draw new tiles at the end of your turn, and play continues until no more tiles remain.
The player with the highest score at the end wins, while the opponent loses five points per unplayed tile.

title: Merge the Numbers
description: Merge the Numbers is a logic game based on connecting numbers. Merge the numbers and reach the highest score!

howToPlay: Merge the Numbers is a logic game based on connecting numbers. Merge the numbers and reach the highest score!

controls.mouse: Click and drag to interact

title: Numbers Arena
description: Numbers Arena is a math, snake, and merge game altogether in one game. The green number means pluses, the red number means minus, and the yellow x2 is to multiply your number. If your number is higher than your enemies, then you can run up to it to break it. Collect gray numbers enemies drop to grow even more! You will win when you reach the right number. Collect numbers to be the biggest in the arena and smash the rest of your enemies!

howToPlay: Numbers Arena is a math, snake, and merge game altogether in one game. The green number means pluses, the red number means minus, and the yellow x2 is to multiply your number. If your number is higher than your enemies, then you can run up to it to break it. Collect gray numbers enemies drop to grow even more! You will win when you reach the right number. Collect numbers to be the biggest in the arena and smash the rest of your enemies!

controls.mouse: Use the WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move around.

title: Stone Puzzle Games
description: Stone Puzzle Game is a brain-teasing experience that blends three unique puzzle styles into one captivating game. Challenge yourself with "Stone Shoot" by merging number stones, connect colorful stones in "Stone Connect," and test your math skills in "Stone Merge" by combining numbers to form higher values. Engage in a variety of challenges to train your mind and master each puzzle type!

howToPlay: Stone Puzzle Game is a brain-teasing experience that blends three unique puzzle styles into one captivating game. Challenge yourself with "Stone Shoot" by merging number stones, connect colorful stones in "Stone Connect," and test your math skills in "Stone Merge" by combining numbers to form higher values. Engage in a variety of challenges to train your mind and master each puzzle type!

controls.mouse: Use the Left Mouse Button to drag, drop, shoot, and connect.

title: Cypher - Code Breaker
description: Cypher - Code Breaker is a brain-teasing logic game where you decipher hidden digits using clever clues and formulas. Each symbol masks a number, and your job is to reveal the correct combination without guessing. Inspired by classics like Sudoku and Mastermind, this puzzle challenges you to think critically and find the one true solution.

howToPlay: Cypher - Code Breaker is a brain-teasing logic game where you decipher hidden digits using clever clues and formulas. Each symbol masks a number, and your job is to reveal the correct combination without guessing. Inspired by classics like Sudoku and Mastermind, this puzzle challenges you to think critically and find the one true solution.

controls.general: Left-click to interact with the UI. Details are explained in-game. Do the Tutorial first!

title: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack
description: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack is a 2D action game where you play as Hiro, a ninja trained by master Daiki and his daughter Hana in a secret ninja village. When the vampire king Dakura discovers the village, he kidnaps Hana and leaves his army of corrupted ninjas, giants, dragons, and witches to guard her. Despite the formidable foes, Hiro is determined to rescue Hana. Why did Dakura take Hana? No one knows. Help Hiro reach the highest tower and rescue his beloved now!

howToPlay: Secret ninja skill that can absorb enemy powers
Transform into a higher form of a ninja when having enough powers
All kinds of evil villains: Vampire, Skeleton, Werewolf, Spider, Dragons,...

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

title: Number Line Match
description: Number Line Match is an educational math game that helps students understand number sequences and patterns. Match numbers to their correct positions on the number line to improve your mathematical skills!

howToPlay: Number Line Match is a puzzle game where you link identical numbers or numbers that add up to 10, forming connections vertically, horizontally, and diagonally to clear them. As you deplete moves, Lines are added, removable only when all their numbers vanish. Be cautious, for a Line on the top row ends the game. Strategic thinking and number pairing are your keys to success.

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button to drag the number.

title: Stack It
description: Stack It is a fun physics-based puzzle game where you need to stack objects carefully while solving mathematical challenges. Test your spatial reasoning and math skills in this engaging game!

howToPlay: STACK.it is a mesmerizing merging game where you swipe or use arrow keys to create stacks. Watch as smaller stacks leap onto larger ones, triggering explosive-size upgrades when they match. Can you reach the coveted 2048 piece or aim for a colossal 32K? Challenge yourself to orchestrate jaw-dropping 10-stack combos and aim for an astounding 15 merges in a single move. Prepare for an addictive, easy-to-learn, hard-to-master experience that'll keep you stacking for hours on end!

controls.mouse: Drag the left mouse button or use arrow keys to swipe the tiles.

title: Math Push
description: Math Push is an exciting puzzle game that combines mathematical calculations with strategic pushing mechanics. Solve equations while navigating through challenging levels!

howToPlay: Math Push is a puzzle game where you move blocks to solve math expressions. Clear the exit by solving the problem and moving on to the next level!

title: Number Digger
description: Number Digger is an adventure math game where you dig through levels while solving numerical puzzles. Collect numbers, solve equations, and discover hidden mathematical treasures!

howToPlay: Number Digger is a casual game in which you merge numbers and hit the right path to get your reward! Buy and upgrade your numbers and do the calculation or just use your luck to complete the level. Allocate resources wisely to reach the treasure chests. Beat the monster at the boss level, and don't forget to count the damage!

controls.mouse: Drag the left mouse button to merge the numbers and use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game buttons.

title: Gravity Crowd
description: Gravity Crowd is a physics-based math game where you control gravity to guide crowds of numbers. Use mathematical thinking to solve puzzles and reach the target!

howToPlay: Gravity Crowd is a thrilling platformer where you guide a stickman that transforms into a growing crowd. Flip gravity with a tap to dodge tricky obstacles, navigate challenging paths, and strategically pass through gates. Every decision shapes the size of your crowd, keeping you on your toes in this fast-paced, dynamic adventure!

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button or space to change the gravity.

title: Math Duck
description: Math Duck is a fun educational game featuring a cute duck that helps children learn mathematics. Solve math problems while enjoying adorable duck animations!

howToPlay: Math Duck is a unique and addicting math-puzzle platformer game where you must help the duck to answer the math quiz correctly in the right order. Take the key to the exit door that appears after you answer all the math quizzes, and go to the exit door fast! You only got 10 seconds on each level, so take the quickest route possible.

title: BFF Math Class
description: BFF Math Class is a social learning game where best friends help each other solve mathematical problems. Work together to complete math challenges and strengthen your friendship!

howToPlay: BFF Math Class is a dress-up game, your task is to assist the girl in getting ready for her math class. You'll need to prepare her bag and create the perfect look. There's a wide selection of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to choose from, allowing you to create a fashionable and stylish appearance for her. Your goal is to make sure she looks cool at school by selecting the trendiest outfits available. Additionally, you'll need to help her complete all her math exercises, combining your fashion stylist skills with some math problem-solving to ensure she's fully prepared for class. Enjoy the game and have fun dressing up the character while sharpening your math skills!

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

title: 100 Doors Puzzle Box
description: 100 Doors Puzzle Box is a challenging escape game with mathematical puzzles. Solve numerical riddles and unlock doors to progress through 100 unique levels!

howToPlay: 100 Doors Puzzle Box is a point-and-click game packed with intriguing puzzles and hidden object challenges. Test your skills as you navigate through nine captivating, animated levels. Engage in unique mechanics like time travel, object combination, and creative problem-solving as you unlock each door and collect achievements. Dive into beautifully detailed locations and unravel the mysteries behind each level!

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button to play.

title: Aritmazetic
description: Aritmazetic is a fast-paced arithmetic game that tests your mental math skills. Solve addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division problems as quickly as possible!

howToPlay: AritMazeTic is a puzzle game in which you need to move from block to block through mazes by doing some basic mathematical operations. How fast can you reach 1,000,000 points? Will you move 500 times before getting down to 0?

controls.mouse: Click and drag to interact

title: Super Number Defense
description: Super Number Defense is a tower defense game with mathematical elements. Use numbers and calculations to defend your base against waves of enemies!

howToPlay: Super Number Defense is a tower defense game where you can put your calculation skills to the test! Strategically defeat waves of enemies by harnessing the power of math. Choose your turrets wisely, as their strength and effectiveness depend on your ability to solve simple math problems. Allocate your resources wisely to maximize your defense capabilities. With its innovative blend of tower defense and math gameplay, this game offers a thrilling and educational gaming experience. Can you protect your base? It's time to unleash the power of numbers!

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button to place and upgrade the turrets.

title: Puzzle Survivor
description: Puzzle Survivor combines survival gameplay with mathematical puzzles. Solve math problems to gather resources and survive in a challenging environment!

howToPlay: Puzzle Survivor is a competitive puzzle game that puts your logic and strategy to the test. Solve word and number challenges across multiple game modes, compete in real-time or turn-based battles, and climb the leaderboards. Take on daily challenges, unlock achievements, and sharpen your mind in fast-paced, brain-training duels!

controls.mouse: Use the Left Mouse Button to interact.

title: The Last Light of Lyra
description: The Last Light of Lyra is an adventure game with mathematical puzzles. Help Lyra solve numerical challenges to restore light to her world in this epic quest!

howToPlay: The Last Light of Lyra is a serene cosmic puzzle adventure where you guide mining ships through a collapsing universe. Traverse fading planets, solve clever number-based puzzles using addition and subtraction, and restore harmony among the stars. With gentle storytelling and dreamlike visuals, it's a peaceful, brain-teasing journey through a beautifully unraveling cosmos.

controls.general: Drag and drop to create a line to move ships between planets.

title: Nullify
description: Nullify is a mathematical puzzle game where you need to make numbers equal zero. Use addition, subtraction, and strategic thinking to nullify all numbers on the board!

howToPlay: 56 Levels to complete
4 Infinite game modes
Black and white theme that can be inverted
Simple and easy controls by dragging elements
13 math symbols

controls.mouse: Drag the left mouse button to move objects.

title: Number Masters
description: Number Masters is a competitive math game where you race against other players to solve numerical challenges. Become the ultimate number master by solving problems faster than your opponents!

howToPlay: Number Masters is a math game where you can challenge yourself to beat everyone in the game. Answer the questions right and quickly so you can climb up the stairs to avoid the sea monster!

controls.mouse: Use the left mouse button to press the right number.

title: Math Expressions
description: Math Expressions is an educational game that teaches students how to solve mathematical expressions and equations. Practice order of operations and algebraic thinking!

howToPlay: MATH EXPRESSions is a WORDLE-inspired game, but instead of finding a word, you need to find a math equation. It's a perfect daily warm-up routine for your brain. On each try, you will get notified if the digit is correct, if the digit is present in the expression but in the wrong place, or if the digit is not present at all. Can you guess the Math Expression in 6 tries?

controls.mouse: Type the math expression on your keyboard or use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game buttons

title: Snake Blockade
description: Snake Blockade combines the classic snake game with mathematical challenges. Guide your snake through numerical obstacles while solving math problems!

howToPlay: Snake Blockade is a casual snake game where you collect points to grow your snake. Use points to crush the blockade. Don't lose all your snake points, or the game will be over!

controls.mouse: Drag the left mouse button to control the snake.

title: XOR
description: XOR is a logic-based math game that teaches binary operations and logical thinking. Master the XOR operation through challenging puzzles and brain teasers!

howToPlay: xor is a mind-bending, minimalist puzzle game. There are three flat figures (triangle, square and rhombus) that must be folded in a certain way to get another, more complex, figure.

controls.mouse: Click and drag to interact

title: Dicetris
description: Dicetris combines Tetris gameplay with dice mathematics. Stack dice blocks while calculating sums and creating mathematical combinations in this unique puzzle game!

howToPlay: Dicetris is a clever block-stacking puzzle game that challenges your math and strategy skills. Align falling dice to match the target sums at the bottom, using color combinations and stacking techniques to maximize your score. With each move, you'll sharpen your thinking while chasing high scores in this engaging and unique puzzle experience.

controls.keyboard: You can also play with the WASD keys.

title: Little Alchemy 2
description: Little Alchemy 2 is a puzzle game where you combine elements to create new ones. Start with basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water, then discover hundreds of new items through experimentation and logical thinking!

howToPlay: 从基础元素开始：空气、土地、火和水
将两个元素拖拽到一起进行合成
观察新创造的元素，并用它们继续实验
发现新的组合来解锁更多复杂的元素
探索科学原理，学习元素之间的关系

controls.mouse: 拖拽元素进行合成，点击查看元素详情
controls.touch: 触摸并拖动元素，轻触查看信息

tips: 尝试将相似的元素组合在一起
思考现实世界中的科学反应
有些组合需要创造性思维
记录成功的组合以便后续使用
不要害怕实验，失败也是学习的一部分

title: Solar System Scope
description: Solar System Scope is an interactive 3D model of our solar system. Explore planets, moons, and celestial bodies while learning about astronomy, space science, and the wonders of our universe!

howToPlay: 探索太阳系的3D模型
点击行星和卫星获取详细信息
使用控制面板调整时间和视角
观察行星的轨道运动
学习天文学知识和宇宙奥秘

controls.mouse: 鼠标拖拽旋转视角，滚轮缩放，点击选择天体
controls.keyboard: 使用方向键移动视角，空格键暂停/播放

tips: 尝试不同的视角观察行星运动
调整时间速度来观察轨道变化
点击行星获取科学数据
比较不同行星的大小和特征
探索卫星系统，如木星的卫星

title: Animal DNA Run
description: Animal DNA Run is an exciting runner game that teaches genetics and biology. Collect DNA sequences to transform into different animals while learning about genetic codes and evolution!

howToPlay: 奔跑并收集DNA序列
根据收集的DNA变身成不同动物
学习基因密码和遗传学原理
避开障碍物继续进化
探索动物王国的多样性

controls.mouse: 鼠标左右移动控制角色方向
controls.keyboard: 使用方向键或WASD控制移动
controls.touch: 滑动屏幕控制角色移动

tips: 收集相同颜色的DNA获得更好的变身
不同动物有不同的特殊能力
观察动物特征与基因的关系
尝试收集稀有的基因组合

title: Mini Scientist
description: Mini Scientist is an educational game that lets you conduct virtual science experiments. Mix chemicals, observe reactions, and learn scientific principles through hands-on experimentation!

howToPlay: 选择实验室中的科学仪器
按照实验步骤进行操作
观察化学反应和物理现象
记录实验结果和数据
学习科学原理和实验方法

controls.mouse: 点击和拖拽实验器材，操作实验设备
controls.touch: 触摸选择工具，滑动进行实验操作

tips: 按正确顺序进行实验步骤
观察实验现象的细节变化
学习安全的实验操作方法

title: Idle Research
description: Idle Research is a simulation game where you manage a research laboratory. Hire scientists, fund projects, and make groundbreaking discoveries while learning about the scientific research process!

howToPlay: 建立和管理科研实验室
雇佣不同专业的科学家
分配研究资金和项目
等待研究成果和突破
学习科学研究的过程和方法

controls.mouse: 点击选择研究项目，拖拽分配资源
controls.touch: 触摸操作界面，管理实验室

tips: 平衡不同领域的研究投入
升级实验室设备提高效率
关注科学家的专业技能
耐心等待重大科学发现

title: Skeleton Simulator
description: Skeleton Simulator is an interactive anatomy learning game. Explore the human skeletal system, learn bone names and functions, and understand how our body's framework supports movement and protection!

howToPlay: 探索人体骨骼系统的3D模型
点击骨骼部位学习名称和功能
完成骨骼拼图和识别挑战
学习骨骼与肌肉的关系
了解人体解剖学知识

controls.mouse: 点击骨骼部位查看信息，拖拽旋转3D模型
controls.keyboard: 使用方向键移动视角，空格键重置视图
controls.touch: 触摸骨骼获取信息，滑动旋转模型

tips: 了解不同年龄骨骼的变化
结合运动理解骨骼的作用
